text: allāhu niṅṅaḷil cilare maṟṟu cilarekkāḷ upajīvanattinṟe kāryattil meccappeṭṭavarākkiyirikkunnu. ennāl (jīvitattil) meccaṁ labhiccavar taṅṅaḷuṭe upajīvanaṁ taṅṅaḷuṭe valatukaikaḷ adhīnappeṭuttivecciṭṭuḷḷavar (aṭimakaḷ) kk viṭṭukeāṭukkukayuṁ, aṅṅane upajīvanattil avar (aṭimayuṁ uṭamayuṁ) tulyarākukayuṁ ceyyunnilla. appēāḷ allāhuvinṟe anugrahatteyāṇēā avar niṣēdhikkunnat
